column4: okay code, so i am on the page with the BIOS and which one should i updater to? there are four, all of which are newer than my version
It seems that using Linux to Flash a BIOS  on a lap top would be a bad idea http://apcmag.com/flashrom-091-hunts-down-more-chips-in-the-wild.htm
Well  read the article and you tell me?  However yes it's probably better to use Windows to Flash the BIOS.
useaully  a computers default BIOS is fine by the way
